languages.text: "Погибель они встретили достойно, как подобает истинным бойцам!"
"They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"
languages.original_text: "Погибель они встретили достойно, как подобает истинным бойцам!"

traits.locale_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"
"They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"
"They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"
"They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

languages.text: “他们光荣赴死，他们是真正的勇士！”
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: “他们光荣赴死，他们是真正的勇士！”

languages.text: 「彼らは栄誉と共に運命に殉じたのだ、真の戦士にふさわしい！」
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは栄誉と共に運命に殉じたのだ、真の戦士にふさわしい！」

languages.text: «¡Murieron con honor, como los verdaderos guerreros que son!».
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Murieron con honor, como los verdaderos guerreros que son!».

languages.text: « Ils sont allés vaillamment au-devant de la mort, comme il sied à de vrais guerriers ! »
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont allés vaillamment au-devant de la mort, comme il sied à de vrais guerriers ! »

languages.text: "Ihr Untergang war ehrenvoll, wie es wahren Kriegern geziemt!"
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Untergang war ehrenvoll, wie es wahren Kriegern geziemt!"

languages.text: "Sonlarına gerçek savaşçılara yaraşır şekilde onurla yürüdüler."
languages.original_text: "They met their doom with honour, as befits true warriors!"

traits.locale_text: "Sonlarına gerçek savaşçılara yaraşır şekilde onurla yürüdüler."
